# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    lines = String[]
    current_line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = String(word)
        else
            current_line *= word * " "
        end
    end

    push!(lines, current_line)

    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage
wrap_string("This is a very long string that needs to be wrapped at a width of 10 characters.") # prints: "This is a very long string that needs to be\nwrapped at a width of 10 characters."
```
